embedding.apiKey.label: Embedding API Key
embedding.apiKey.help: API key for embeddings (OpenAI or Doubao). Not required when using local embeddings.

embedding.model.label: Embedding Model
embedding.model.help: Embedding model to use (e.g. text-embedding-3-small or bge-small-zh-v1.5, doubao-embedding-vision-251215)

embedding.provider.label: Embedding Provider
embedding.provider.help: Embedding provider: 'openai' (default), 'doubao', or 'local' for on-device embeddings.

embedding.localModelDir.label: Local Model Directory
embedding.localModelDir.help: Filesystem path to the local embedding model when provider is 'local'. If omitted, the default extensions/memory-lancedb/models/bge-small-zh-v1.5 path is used.

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically capture important information from conversations

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant memories into context
